item.title: Checking status of specific jail
item.description: 1root@example:/var/log# fail2ban-client status sshd 2Status for the jail: sshd 3|- Filter 4| |- Currently failed: 6 5| |- Total failed: 91801 6| `- File list: /var/log/auth.log 7`- Actions 8|- Currently banned: 1 9|- Total banned: 9971 10`- Banned IP list: 51.15.255.133
